Ethics Committee
================

The City of Corinth adopted a Code of Ethics policy requiring that public officials and employees be independent, impartial, and responsible while representing the City in any capacity for which he/she was appointed or elected. The City of Corinth Ethics Commission will be accountable to the Mayor and City Council. The City Council shall have primary responsibility for the enforcement of this code.

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| **Number of Members:** | 5 regular members |
| **Term of Office:** | 2-year term with no term limit |
| **Established:** | [Ordinance No. 24-11-07-46](https://www.cityofcorinth.com/sites/default/files/fileattachments/ethics_commission/page/1511/ordinance_no._24-11-07-46_-_amending_ethics_code_updated_11.19.24.docx.pdf) |
| **Appointed By:** | Mayor and City Council |
| **Meetings:** | Called on an "as-needed" basis |
| **Time:** | TBD |
| **Location:** | Council Workroom, City Hall, 3300 Corinth Parkway |

### Duties / Responsibilities

* Implement and enforce the Code of Ethics
* Recommend amendments to the Code of Ethics

### Qualifications

Members of the advisory board may not hold an elected municipal office within the City of Corinth, and may not serve on any other advisory board or commission within the City of Corinth.

### Agendas and Minutes

[View All Agendas and Minutes](https://www.corinthtx.gov/meetings)

### **Board Members**

|  |  |  |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Lauren Kuzinarek | Place 1 Board Member | Term - September 2027 |
| Andrew Morris | Place 2 Board Member | Term - September 2026 |
| Amanda Scallon | Place 3 Board Member | Term - September 2027 |
| Ryan Gamble | Place 4 Board Member | Term - September 2026 |
| Kristin Haire | Place 5 Board Member | Term - September 2027 |
